body: Hi Youngjae, When I open your definition there are so many missing plugins as I don't have them installed on my system. To help this conversation going I made and example where I made two panels, then I meshed them inside the component, then found average number for each panel and moved the center point outward based on this number. I hope this shows the workflow. [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/LG4v1FKIM7nNGs94qa675ZHakHUri5-U0tDfWplMp3BU6Mr4U-zCS7Yfols4**Dh8hnZn1FAEQCHdNVXNJObU04oNTgcPdz7/averageForPanels.png) Mostapha
